imgDesc.text: Wet environments and Hydro Attacks can cause beings to become <color=#ffe14b>affected by Hydro.</color> When Hydro meets other elements, it often triggers an <color=#ffe14b>Elemental Reaction</color> .

Wet environments and Hydro Attacks can cause beings to become <color=#ffe14b>affected by Hydro.</color> When Hydro meets other elements, it often triggers an <color=#ffe14b>Elemental Reaction</color> .
